segments.text: Wow , your apartment is a mess .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , I didn't have time to put things away before you got here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look ! Are those all your clothes on the couch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually most of them are dirty . I haven't done laundry in a while . I usually wait until I can do it at my parent's house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My sister and I usually go to the laundromat down the street . Why don't you go there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know I should , but that place isn't very convenient . You have to wait for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I know . I have to do it every week . Anyway , are you ready to go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No I'm not ready yet . I still have to brush my teeth and wash my face . Can you wait for a few minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , but please hurry . I think the restaurant is closing soon .
segments.speaker: S2
